reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Burundi: Advancing Constructive Dialogue in Burundi

description.narrative: CMI has been active in Burundi since 2015. National stakeholders and selected international partners have welcomed and appreciated the nature of CMI as an independent, impartial, and non-threatening organization. Particularly, CMI provides safe, informal s paces where ideas can be explored, exchanged and tested towards finding common ground for peaceful solutions. Through strategic and targeted accompaniment of key national actors and structures, regional efforts and selected international actors, the CMI ai ms to contribute to opening up of political space in Burundi. In order to contribute to preparing the ground for a more conducive environment for peaceful political contestation, CMI aims to: increase trust and dialogue in the political arena of Burundi; continue internal dialogue aiming at preventing escalation ahead of the 2020 electoral process; and contribute to a more coordinated approach of the international community in Burundi.
